item.title: Apple Silicon M1: Black. Magic. Fuckery.
item.description: These are the words used by the user holdagold on reddit to describe their experience with the new Apple Silicon M1 Macbook Air. Rarely does a product leave people effusing to the extent Apple Silicon M1 has done this week.
